name: the research facility NO.507
description:
Attention:
this game is working in progress, now It provides basic game features, and is released as an early access build. We expect to build this game world together with all the players of this game.


Key feature:
Extend content based on players’ feedback
Chinese elements
Rough art style
Own play soundtrack
Own play dubbing
Chinese version, no need to do translation
No particular gameplay
